text: 7. 8 million viewers tuned in to watch a man propose then break the hearts of not one, but two women on the Season 22 finale of The Bachelor Monday night. ABC's hit dating reality show has seen immeasurable success since its premiere in 2002. And those numbers show no signs of letting up. Viewers continue to tune in year after year to see a storybook romance come to life, despite the terrible track - record of Bachelor Nation couples actually making it. Over the past 16 years, The Bachelor and its several spinoffs, including The Bachelorette, Bachelor Pad, Bachelor in Paradise, Bachelor in Paradise : After Paradise, and The Bachelor Winter Games, have turned every day people into celebrities overnight.
